data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "When people succeed, it is because of hard work; luck has nothing to do with success. Do you agree or disagree? Why? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: Some people hold the view that success is achieved via hard work only. While there are certainly valid viewpoints, on the contrary, I personally believe that sometimes luck can lead to success as well. This is because luck is often associated with opportunity, and in order to succeed, one needs the right timing and opportunity. If a person has put all his effort into getting prepared for something, but unfortunately missed the only chance to get the final step done, then everything is meaningless. To sum up, considering all the factors mentioned above, luck is an essential part of success （101字）
